Oops, sorry. I forgot all about your chars.

::Zardus::

Zardus looks at the Destrocons.

"Yes, you may join. You," he says, pointing to Ramjet, "Will be the leader of 
your team. Now kill these fools!" He orders, pointing at Shocker, Tritan, 
Icedeamon, and Archangel.
